name: The gift of shadow
data: It gives small bonus to the skill 'psionic efficiency'.
It increases the users intelligence incredibly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'offensive efficiency'.
When flipped, the coin always lands face-side up.
